channel.title: How to rune private servers - help
channel.description:
Hi guys, I am a newbie here iand i am wondering how to run privaate servers. I have moparsape and heaps of other things, like pvpscape, phonescape etc.. but the only one i can run is moparscape, which runs HybridScape and i cant save my game on that anyway. What do i run other Servers in and what do i have to do????! Sorry for the questions but i am new! Im also sorry if this is in the wrong seection, it sounds right!!!
Chris
chris@fcp.com.au

item.title: How to rune private servers - help
item.dc:creator: @sir_cvl sir cvl
item.description:
@sir_cvl wrote:

i use mine a updated testscape one i will start with p 16 soon…

btw testscape is good for beginners lol

-sir cvl(christoph van liere - rofl)
